commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Time for lunch!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Should I go to the clubroom to eat lunch today? I think we're almost at 1,000 volunteers... I really wanna know...)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I'll invite Ayumu, too...)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh? I was just about to head over to your classroom, but here you are.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup! I wanted to invite you to have lunch outside the classroom today.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Let me guess... In the clubroom? This morning we had over 850 volunteer sign-ups, so I did want to check on the number over lunch.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, you totally get it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Everyone's already here?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* Looks like it!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We all had the same idea!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The two of you wanted to know the latest number of volunteers, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: And you guys did too?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yep! I've been so curious all day.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* Same as us then!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So what is it up to now?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We haven't looked yet.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hiii! You should know that I was the first one here!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I was about to check the site when Karin showed up, and then everyone else came too.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We were just saying that we're only missing you and Ayumu.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ooh, I see. For us all to be here...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Kinda gives you a sense of foreboding, right?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That's not quite it...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'd say it's more like our hearts are linked, right?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It really feels like we're connected!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Like we're all one, and it makes me kinda happy!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Okay, since we're all together, let's check the site!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Ooh, I'm so nervous...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Here it is! Let's see... Wait, what? Whaaaaatttt?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We're at 982... Wow...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's way more than it was this morning... And we still have so much time before the deadline we agreed to with Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: My eyes aren't playing tricks on me, right?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh no, what if we're all dreaming the same dream?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's not a dream... It looks like we might actually be on track to meet our goal today!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh! Another three people just signed up... wait, another four too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: After the meeting we had the other day, the members of μ's and Aqours promoted the event all over for us. You can really tell that the word is getting out.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ooh, another five people! Now we're at 994... Just six people left.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What if we hit 1,000 during lunch?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There's a high possibility. Rina-chan Board says, "Tremble!"

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm so excited I can't eat my lunch!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Now it's at 995... Just five left!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's all watch together as we hit our goal!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We're really going to be able to hold the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Our dream of getting to be on the same stage as μ's and Aqours is really coming true!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's not just coming true, we made this happen ourselves! We worked together to make our dream a reality!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Right!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, 999! Just one more!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm so nervous my heart is aching.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Come on, just one more person!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: W-We did it... A thousand people... We met our goal!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yaaaaaaay!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Heheh. Get a load of that, Shioko! We got all the volunteers we needed practically overnight! That's proof of what we can do!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Should we go and report this to Shioriko after school?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, let's do it! I bet she'll give us all the help we need now!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I see, you've gathered enough volunteers. Congratulations. The next step will be to invite everyone who applied to an info session.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What? That's it?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Were you expecting something else?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: No, just... I mean, I thought you'd be a bit more surprised, or upset, or tell us we did a good job... You know, any sort of emotional reaction.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Did you want me to have a breakdown over it or something?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: W-Well... I did kind of want to see that.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's all right, Kasumi. Things still worked out. Now that we have Shioriko's approval, we can start thinking about what we need to do next!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hmm, I guess this settles the issue of where our venue will be.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We've come so far already, now all that's left is to zoom to the finish line!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We've gotta hold an info session for our volunteers right away! We'll go get started on that right now, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: All right.
